entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BLOCKING] All Pomelo tests fail with the same service resolution exception after upgrading from 6.0 Preview 7 to 6.0 RC1 #26260
  • Owned Types get attached multiple times as different types #26257

Closed

  • ef.property called with wrong property name when call odata $expand for derived type #24867
    MQ
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use Span overload of sqlite3_prepare_v2 #16202
    6.0.0-preview3
  • Migrations / Temporal Tables: Temporal SYSTEM_TIME period is already defined on table when executing idempotent script #26252
  • Mix AsSingleQuery / AsSplitQuery #26244
  • Why does Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SNI.dll get published under runtimes? #26175
  • Help Aggregating Data on an IGrouping #26141
  • Scaffold-DbContext with NoPluralize flag incorrectly singularizes the navigation property name for the collection #26061

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Fix API docs errors #26261
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26259
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26256
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26255
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [6.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.4 #26248
  • Update branding for 5.0.12 #26254
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Update branding for 3.1.21 #26253
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/3.1 #26150
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26237
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [5.0.x] Fix context pooling concurrency issue #26241
    Servicing-approved, 5.0.12
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/2.1 #26149
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.0
  • More GroupBy tests #26105
  • update odata tests to 8.0 #26201
